name: Game of Ukkels: Japan Kaiki
description:
Spartakos Kyber is back to punish the lawless.

Knife is only for the professionals.

FEATURES

  • Tank controls - get that classic feel
  • Tracker music - 100% perfect looping digital audio
  • 5 weapons - all different! Run faster with knife.
  • 13 levels - including two puzzle maps
  • Some blood - but not too much
The Berlusconi M2 shotgun. Ludvig-14 RPG. For those who lead risky lives. Each rocket launched from this tube is full of excitement and royal grace.

The game sort of works on macOS & Linux via Wine.
